altername_name: Disney's Mickey to Minnie Trick & Chase
name: Disney's Hide & Sneak
overview: Disney's Hide and Sneak, known as Mickey and Minnie Trick and Chase (ミッキー＆ミニー トリック＆チェイス Mikkī & Minī Torikku & Cheisu) in Japan, is an action-adventure video game released in 2003 by Capcom. This is last game to featuring Mickey Mouse as protagonist until 2010 video game Epic Mickey.
